title: BATTLE FOR INDEPENDENCE - Empire Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
Empire Total War Mod Gameplay - Happy 4th of July!  To celebrate today we have an awesome 1v1 fort battle on Empire Total War.  Great Britain is defending a wooden fort, and the United States Army is attacking :D Enjoy the fight!  Have a safe fun 4th of July!!

Mod Link: http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?656694-NTW-Graphics-for-ETW&p=13913400#post13913400 

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
